sentences.en: After the meal, I could feel lethargy overtaking me.
Becky roused up from her lethargy of distress and showed good interest in the proceedings.
sentences.cn: 贝基这下来了劲头,对事态的发展表现出了强烈的兴趣.

sentences.en: Captain Black yawned deliciously, rubbed the last lethargy from his eyes and laughed gloatingly.
sentences.cn: 布莱克上尉很惬意地打了呵欠, 驱走了最后一丝睡意,幸灾乐祸地笑了起来.

sentences.en: Get your body moving to boost energy, stay supple and shake off winter lethargy.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体以增加活力，保持柔韧性，甩掉冬日的慵懒。

sentences.en: He felt that he had to drag himself out of his lethargy and begin to write.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己必须打起精神,开始写作.

sentences.en: He had gradually dropped to the floor, and lay there in a lethargy, worn out.
sentences.cn: 两人走上前去把父女俩从地上扶了起来--老人已逐渐歪倒在地上, 精疲力竭, 昏睡过去.

sentences.en: New mothers often complain of lethargy and mild depression.
sentences.cn: 初为人母者经常抱怨说身体疲倦乏力，有轻微的抑郁。

sentences.en: Several hours after the surgery, she is still in her lethargy.
sentences.cn: 手术过后几小时, 她仍然昏睡不醒.

sentences.en: She suffers from bouts of lethargy and depression.
sentences.cn: 她一阵阵无精打彩、情绪低落.

sentences.en: She was suddenly overcome by lethargy.
Symptoms include fever, lethargy lack of appetite and coughing.
sentences.cn: 症状包括发烧 、 嗜睡无力、食欲不振、咳嗽.

sentences.en: The onset is usually gradual and associated with anorexia, lethargy.
sentences.cn: 通常起病渐进,伴有厌食, 昏睡.

sentences.en: The same lethargy, I am afraid, characterizes the use of all our faculties and senses.
sentences.cn: 恐怕, 同倦的懒散也成为利用我们所有的本能和感觉的特点.

sentences.en: The side - effects included dizziness, nausea, vomiting, lethargy and constipation etc.
sentences.cn: 主要不良反应有头晕 、 恶心 、 呕吐 、 嗜睡和便秘等.

sentences.en: Typical is with nonspecific symptoms as lethargy or failure to thrive.
sentences.cn: 典型的伴有非特异性症状,如嗜睡或生长停滞.

sentences.en: Winston roused himself a little from his lethargy.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿从懒洋洋的惰性中振作起一些来.

words.tran_cn: 昏睡的；无生气的；泠漠的
昏睡；死气沉沉；[医]嗜眠（症）

trans.tran_cn: 昏睡，没精打采，懒洋洋，嗜眠症
